The claim made by the Iowa: based meteorologist in the viral video is that icicles contain bird poop.
The video: posted on TikTok, has been viewed more than 14.5 million times, indicating its widespread popularity and reach.
The meteorologist: Katie Nickolaou, explains in the video that icicles form when water melts off roofs and runs down the side of a building, potentially picking up bird poop along the way.
Snopes: a fact-checking website, reached out to the National Weather Service and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for further clarification on the claim but did not receive a response at the time of publication.
